This is one of the biggest issues I have with lower tier players.  It is not just the supports job to ward.  Every player should be buying wards **throughout ** the game.  Just because you get 1 free half ward doesn't mean you don't have to buy wards any more.  The it is up to the individual lane to keep their area warded.  The support buys ward for the bot lane so the ADC can spend more gold on weapons and get snowballing faster.

My point? {{item:2044}} , {{item:2044}} , and {{item:2043}} .
